DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate feasibility apply neuromuscular electrical stimulation lumbar spine , report tolerable intervention , whether electrical stimulation improve pain , function muscle strength .
DOC.brief_title: Stabilization Exercises Alone v Stabilization Exercises Plus Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation People With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Between 18 year age 60 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 34 . Low Back Pain duration 3 month great ( chronic ) . Minimum pain level Numeric Pain Rating Scale ( NPRS ) 3 great . Minimum score Modified Oswestry Disability Questionnaire ( MODQ ) 20 great . Understands English Positive nerve root tension sign Progressive neurological deficit Positive Babinski sign . Sensory loss correspondence dermatomal distribution peripheral nerve . History spinal surgery History inflammatory joint disease Contraindications physical exercise include history cardiac disease tell physician engage physical exercise . Contraindications NMES include cardiac pacemaker skin allergy adhesive History metastatic cancer previous 5 year present treatment cancer Women indicate pregnant plan become pregnant
